info.headline: Flood Warning issued July 25 at 9:34AM CDT until July 27 at 7:28AM CDT by NWS Kansas City/Pleasant Hill MO
info.description:
...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Missouri...Kansas...
Big Creek at Blairstown affecting Johnson, Cass and Henry Counties.
Blackwater River near Blue Lick affecting Saline and Cooper Counties.
Stranger Creek at Easton affecting Atchison and Leavenworth Counties.
...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Missouri...
Blackwater River at Valley City affecting Johnson and Pettis Counties.
Crooked River near Richmond affecting Ray County.
Little Blue River near Lake City affecting Jackson County.
Wakenda Creek at Carrollton affecting Carroll County.
* WHAT...Moderate flooding is occurring and moderate flooding is forecast.
* WHERE...Blackwater River at Valley City.
* WHEN...Until Sunday morning.
* IMPACTS...At 22.0 feet, Woodlands and farm fields along the river begin to flood. At 25.0 feet, County Highway E near Valley City and Highway 23 near the Perry State Wildlife Area are under water.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:00 AM CDT Friday the stage was 26.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 27.5 feet this evening. It will then fall below flood stage tomorrow morning. - Flood stage is 22.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction:
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.
This product along with additional weather and stream information is available at www.weather.gov/kc/.

parameter.value: FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL SUNDAY MORNING
